Talk_30:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I think I'll start by checking out some well-known hot
springs. See what I can find out while I'm there.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs <clr:ffff>is probably my best bet...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah! Sorry for showing up out of the blue.<sp:5:0:0>
Did you...make this hole?

I heard a loud noise and thought I'd
check it out...

And now, my hot-springs dream has come
true! All thanks to you!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>What was with those red stones,
anyway?

Well, at least I can finally relax and go
hunting for Simmerstone Springs.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry for showing up after you did all the
work getting in here...

But, if ya don't mind, there is somethin'
I've been wanting to do...

Pardon me a moment.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>The temperature...it's perfect!<sp:5:0:0> And how
about this...

Mmm...<sp:5:2:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>De...<sp:5:1:0> Delicious!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Yes! This is it! No doubt about it!
This is Simmerstone Springs!

I had heard the entrance was collapsed,
and no one could get in anymore...
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>No doubt this is the perfect <clr:0000>spring-boiled
egg<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0> It's exactly as good as I hoped it
would be!
Oh,<sp:5:1:0> guess I forgot to mention why I was
lookin' for this place, eh?

It was so I could make this incredible
spring-boiled egg!

Of course, if you hadn't found a way
to get inside, well, I never would've
found it!
So please, you've got to let me give you
a reward.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, hey, wait!


You happen to know anything about this
place called <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>?
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Well then, excuse me, but I'm going
to go ahead...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You're in such a rush to get outta here...
Is that because you know somethin'
about <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>?
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_01>Ah, nibbling on the perfect spring-boiled
egg while soaking in the perfect hot
spring! It doesn't get better than this!
Of course, I'm more than happy to share
with you.

Go on, have some if ya like.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh, hey. <sp:5:0:0>Wasn't expecting to run into
another Hylian here.

Traveling around these parts isn't exactly
easy, what with the Gorons acting all
weird and whatnot.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I swear, you can't hardly carry on a
conversation with 'em anymore.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Ugh, I can't believe I went to so much
trouble to travel to Goron City and find
Simmerstone Springs...
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Eh...<sp:5:1:0>so...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I suppose that's your way of sayin' <sp:5:0:0>
ya don't know anything?

It's just...I'm trying to find this secret hot
spring called Simmerstone Springs.

But I still don't have a clue where it is.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I know. I know. That's what makes it a
SECRET hot spring. Only those in the
know...know where it is.
But I've got an idea. I'm gonna visit some
well-known hot-water hangouts and get
info from the hot-springs buffs there.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm...I suppose a good place to start is
<clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs<clr:ffff>, eh?<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll look it
up on a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Don't tell me you've never heard of
<clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>

What?<sp:5:1:0> Really?


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Eh...<sp:5:0:0>I mean...<sp:5:0:0>if I'm bein' honest, I guess 
I don't really know that much about
the place either.
I just know there's this secret hot spring
called Simmerstone Springs somewhere
near Goron City.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>But, well, I guess that's what makes
it a SECRET hot spring. <sp:5:0:0>Only those in
the know...know about it! Ya know?
What I think I'm gonna do is try to talk
to some <clr:0000>hot-spring buffs <clr:ffff>at the not-secret

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm...I suppose <clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs<clr:ffff> is a good place
to start.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll look it up on a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, good morning! So, you haven't left
Goron City, eh?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Chat_00>There's somethin' suspicious about you!<sp:5:0:0>
I'm bettin' you know a thing or two
about <clr:0000>Simmerstone Springs<clr:ffff>.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, hello! You're still hanging around
Goron City, eh?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Well, good evening. So you're still
hanging around Goron City.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Truth is, I've been huntin' high and
low for Simmerstone Springs!

It's a secret hot spring and not well
known, even among the Gorons. So, I've
had a hard time figuring out where it was.
But I finally got this Goron—a real
hot-springs buff—to spill some details.
That's why I headed over here.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Big surprise. The Gorons are still eating 
those weird red stones.

There's no way I can chat with 'em
when they're like this.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I came to Goron City hoping to find
Simmerstone Springs...but it looks
like I just wasted my time.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>By the looks of it, you haven't found out
anything either.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Guess that's what makes it a secret hot
spring. Only those in the know...know
about it! <sp:5:0:0>But at least the search is fun.
I'm planning to start by visiting the
well-known hot springs. I'll see if I can
get info out of the hot-spring buffs there.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hmm...I suppose <clr:0000>Goron Hot Springs<clr:ffff> is a good place
to start.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I'll look it up on a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey. <sp:5:0:0>You here in Goron City for a bit
of sightseeing too?

If so, you've got some perfect timing!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Up until recently, the Gorons were acting
real weird.

You could barely even hold a simple
conversation with 'em.

The second those strange red stones
vanished, well, they came right to
their senses.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Good news is, I can finally go looking
for Simmerstone Springs,<sp:5:0:0> which is why
I came here in the first place.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>Ugh, what's the deal with those red
rocks anyhow?

I went to all kinds of trouble gettin'
myself to Goron City, just hoping I could
find Simmerstone Springs...
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Those strange red rocks have vanished
and the Gorons are all back to actin'
normal.
Finally! Now I can go lookin' for
Simmerstone Springs, which is the
whole reason I came here.
